name: Star Survivors
description:
A Free Downloadable Game for Windows.

Description

In Star Survivors players control a small spaceship drone beset by a swarm of never-ending missiles. The drone ship automatically targets and fires at the incoming missiles, leaving the player to focus on navigating and avoiding the incoming enemies. Movement is inspired by actual space physics, meaning momentum in any direction is constant until cancelled out by an opposing movement; the player must be careful of the course they plot!

Controls

Controls are fully remappable in-game, and support both keyboard and joypad inputs.

Default Keyboard Controls

Rotate Left: A Key

Rotate Right: D Key

Thrust Forward: = W Key

Dash Left: = Q Key

Dash Right: = E Key

Default Joypad Controls

Rotate Left: Left Analog Stick

Rotate Right: Left Analog Stick

Thrust Forward: = Cross/A button

Dash Left: = Square/X button

Dash Right: = Circle/B button

Credits
